content: MFT-FOX HI Bracket Horizontal aluminum bracket with thermal pad ### Categories: Home > Products > Facade mounting systems > Brackets- - - ### FEATURES:Features Pre-assembled A4 screw for easy fastening of support profile Pre-assembled insulator Up to 40 mm adjustability of the support profile Grooved washer for precise vertical alignment 11 mm hole for use of anchors on concrete and masonry Applications Suitable for all facade cladding Single-layer system with horizontally mounted support profiles Dual-layer system with horizontally and vertically mounted substructure profiles ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: EN AW-6063 T66 Insulation material: Polypropylene Thickness Insulation Material: 0.2 in Technical Data | Material composition | EN AW-6063 T66 | Insulation material | Polypropylene | Thickness Insulation Material | 0.2 in | Width | 68 mm | Height | 86 mm ### ITEMS- 2084229 -
